ValidationRule.description: When the Number of Payrolls the Firm Processes is populated, the field Types of Payrolls Processed is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Core Referral Source Record Type", ISCHANGED( Number_of_Payrolls_the_Firm_Processes__c ), NOT( ISPICKVAL( Number_of_Payrolls_the_Firm_Processes__c, "" )), ISBLANK( Types_of_Payrolls_Processed__c ), $User.ProfileName__c <> "System Administrator", $User.ProfileName__c <> "Sales Enablement" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Types of Payrolls Processed cannot be blank when Number of Payrolls the Firm Processes is populated.
